info.description: API to Add/Remove/List Guest Diagnostics Configuration to Azure Resources
info.title: Guest Diagnostic Settings

get.description: Get a list of all guest diagnostic settings in a subscription.

schema.description: A list of guest diagnostic settings.

nextLink.description: Provides the link to retrieve the next set of elements.

value.description: The list of guest diagnostic settings.

items.description: Virtual machine guest diagnostics settings resource.

properties.description: The diagnostic settings to be applied to azure resources.

dataSources.description: the array of data source object which are configured to collect and send data

items.description: Data source object contains configuration to collect telemetry and one or more sinks to send that telemetry data to

osType.description: Operating system type for the configuration

default.description: An error occurred and the list of guest diagnostic settings could not be retrieved.

schema.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.
